name: Ride or Die!
description:
Ride or die with BHAD BHABIE! Jump on & joyride any car on the road, dodge heavy traffic, and outrun the cops in high-speed chases to steal cars. Collect all the cars in your garage, upgrade them for bonus abilities, and make mad money. Get ready to Ride or Die!

- JUMP ON & JOYRIDE ANY CAR -
Jump on and ride any vehicle on the road, from fire engines & ice cream trucks to sports cars & taxi cabs. Jump from car to car before you get shaken off. Go far, pick up that cash, and earn respect on the Leaderboard.

- OUTRUN COPS & STEAL CARS -
The cops will do whatever it takes to stop you from stealing a car - they’ll set up roadblocks, spike strips and try to run you off the road. Beat the final roadblock and the car is yours, grand theft auto.

- COLLECT & UPGRADE YOUR RIDES -
Steal as many cars as you can and upgrade them for bonus abilities. More more money from stealing more cars. Complete your Garage and watch the cash roll in.

- ROLL WITH BHAD BHABIE -
Play as BHAD BHABIE - top rap artist nominated for a Billboard Music Award and killing it as a Hot 100 rapper. Collect Bhad Bhabie’s gear and customize her look.

Collect cash, steal cars, get rich.
Own the streets with Bhad Bhabie.

Play Now - Ride or Die!
